example: A job seeker should prepare a well-written resume and practice interview skills.

english: be free of noise and distraction
example: A quiet room free of noise and distraction is ideal for focused work.
Companies that innovate consistently tend to achieve great success in the market.
Learning new skills can help employees increase competitiveness in the job market.
Implementing new software can significantly boost efficiency in data processing.
Many white-collar workers prefer flexible working hours to balance work and life.
Sound-sensitive individuals may need noise-canceling headphones in open offices.
A catchy headline can quickly grab readers' attention and increase article views.

english: disrupt the flow of sb’s work
example: Frequent meetings can disrupt the flow of work and reduce productivity.
Administrative staff often spend hours processing files and data daily.
After streamlining procedures, the team's efficiency skyrocketed by 40%.
Completing projects ahead of time allows for thorough quality checks.

english: there is a critical fact that goes unnoticed: …
chinese: 句式：有一个被忽视的重要事实:…
example: There is a critical fact that goes unnoticed: regular breaks improve productivity.
Products must achieve the required standard before being released to the market.
A fair bonus system can motivate employees to perform better.
Expensive products are not necessarily of higher quality than affordable ones.
Medical research is a highly specialized field requiring extensive training.
Her expertise in digital marketing helped the company expand online presence.
Without clear goals, teams may go in the wrong direction and waste resources.
Automated tools are excellent efficiency-boosters in repetitive tasks.
A confident and well-prepared candidate leaves a deep impression on interviewers.
Small-scale companies often offer more flexible work environments than large corporations.
A viral social media campaign can generate extensive publicity for a new brand.
Startups must manage their budget carefully to avoid financial difficulties.
Well-advertised products often attract more customers initially.
User experience is crucial for the success of any digital product.
Communication is a key factor in maintaining strong team collaboration.
Managers should assign tasks properly based on employees' strengths.
Effective leaders know how to play to their team members' strengths.
Streamlining workflows can help maximize overall efficiency in an organization.
The team raced against time to meet the project deadline.
Employees who consistently meet deadlines are highly valued by employers.
The best-case situation is that we finish the project early; the worst-case is missing the deadline.

english: at the root of sth. is …
example: At the root of the company's issues is a lack of clear communication.
Government subsidies can help ease the financial burden on low-income families.
Investing in employee training creates a positive cycle of improved performance.
Insiders who have inside information about the company must maintain confidentiality.
Companies should present a positive image through responsible social practices.

chinese: 有太多强劲的竞争对手
example: In the tech industry, startups often face many strong competitors.
Frequent policy changes can increase unfamiliarity among employees.

english: lead to greater losses on both side
example: A trade war can lead to greater losses on both sides of the conflict.
Teams that lack coordination often fail to finish projects on time.
He can't even solve simple problems, let alone complex ones.
Many job seekers ask friends for job leads in their desired industry.

english: send a letter of introduction or resume
chinese: 发送一封介绍信或简历
example: Always send a letter of introduction along with your resume when applying for a job.
The job requires skills in coding, design, marketing, so on and so forth.
Job seekers should reach out to industry professionals for informational interviews.
Companies can tap into new markets by understanding consumer needs.
Some job positions are not advertised publicly but filled through internal referrals.
